Rotimi Williams bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na onye bụbu onye nta akụkọ
O nwere ugbo osikapa Kereksuk na steeti Nassarawa nke bụ ugbo osika nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa site na oke ala.
Ugbo ya, nke dị na steeti Nasarawa n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa, dị ugbu a na hekta 45,000 ma were ihe karịrị ụmụ amaala Nasarawa 600 n'ọrụ
Ọ gụrụ Economics na mahamudu Aberdeen, Scotland ma nwee nzere masta na Economics site n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ gara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Oriental and African Studies (SOAS), ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na Finance and Development Studies.
Ọ bụ onye nyocha na European Economics and Financial Centre na London na 2007
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye Africa na-enye aka na Euromoney Magazine na 2008
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na First City Monument Bank na 2008 ebe o kwuru na nchegbu ya maka ngalaba ọrụ ugbo malitere itolite ebe ụlọ akụ ahụ agaghị anabata iwu ma banye n'ụlọ ọrụ ugbo
Ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2010 iji malite ugbo osikapa dị hekta 45,000 nke Kereksuk n'afọ 2012.
